subject: Re: [junit] Re: Migrating Junit 4.10 to 3.8.1
msgSnippet: Marvin, In your code you have: *public* *void* testPlugins_notActive() {91
messageBody:
Marvin,

In your code you have:

*public* *void* testPlugins_notActive() {91
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#91>
92 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#92>
*try* {93
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#93>
SjcGeneralStoreUtil.createPluginGM("TimerNotActivePlugin");94
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#94>
95 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#95>
Assert.fail();96
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#96>
} *catch* (*final* Exception e) {97
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#97>
98 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#98>
SjcBaseOutsideContainerTestCase.assertException(99
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#99>
ActivateException.*class*, e);100
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#100>
}101 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#101>
}

Is there any reason why you don't have:


*public* *void* testPlugins_notActive() throws Exception {91
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#91>
92 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#92>
*try* {93
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#93>
SjcGeneralStoreUtil.createPluginGM("TimerNotActivePlugin");94
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#94>
95 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#95>
Assert.fail();96
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#96>
} *catch* (*final* ActivateException e) {97
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#97>
// test passed100
<http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#100>
}101 <http://patternenabled.com/source/xref-test/info/soaj/core/timer/PiTimerTest.html#101>
}

And let JUnit handle any unexpected exceptions?

Maybe she awoke to see the roommate's boyfriend swinging from the
chandelier wearing a boar's head.

Something which you, I, and everyone else would call "Tuesday", of course.
